Welcome!

Tasty Boards is a local Cheese and Charcuterie board delivery business made with nothing but the finest ingredients.

About Tasty Boards:

This started as my own love for cheese grew, pairing and sharing with friends and family. I love being in the kitchen creating, cooking, trying out new recipes and spices. As my children have grown and left the house I could not stop creating and making foods that people will continue to communally enjoy. To me there is nothing better than gathering with friends/family enjoying each other's company while sharing food and drinks. This is how Tasty Boards was born.

Areas we serve

Livermore, Pleasanton, Dublin, San Ramon, Sunol & Danville

How Can I order? You can fill out the online order form, email, call or text. We will respond the same day to confirm and get the tasting on the to you.

When Should I Order: The sooner the better but we need a minimum of 2 days notice to get you the freshest ingredients available.

How Can I Pay: You can pay via, Venmo, Paypal, Cash & Check upon delivery is also a great option.

© Tasty Boards BC.
